com.sap.cloud.sdk.s4hana.connectivity

Class ErpEndpointMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.monitoring.JmxMonitor
      • com.sap.cloud.sdk.s4hana.connectivity.ErpEndpointMonitor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ErpEndpointMonitorMXBean, EventListener, javax.servlet.ServletContextListener

    @WebListener
public class ErpEndpointMonitor
extends JmxMonitor
implements ErpEndpointMonitorMXBean
    Used to monitor statistics for SAP S/4HANA queries.
